price: 71. Dheh: bal ka warrama, hadduu Alle ka yeelo habeenka joogto tan iyo maalinta Qiyaamaha, Ma ilaah baa jira aan ahayn Alle oo idiin keeni kara iftiin, miyeydaan wax maqleyn?.
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ سَرۡمَدًا إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مَنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِضِيَآءٍۚ أَفَلَا تَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in jaʿala al-lahu ʿalaykumu al-layla sarmadan ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati man ilāhun ghayru al-lahi yatīkum biḍiyāin afalā tasmaʿūna
